summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4597 for the improvement of 23rd Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to a point approximately 200 feet south of East 63rd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53563, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
